Description_en: Announcing a new tender (call for proposals) process. Tender release should contain details of the goods or services being sought.

An amendment to an existing tender release. There should be at least one tender release with the same ocid, but an earlier releaseDate, before a tenderAmendment is published. The term amendment has legal meaning in many jurisdictions.
Notes: From https://github.com/open-contracting/standard/issues/106#issuecomment-60083612 - Canada has legal amendments to a call for Tender

Description_en: An updated to an existing tender release. There should be at least one tender release with the same ocid, but an earlier releaseDate, before a tenderUpdate is published. An update may add new information or make corrections to prior published information. It should not be used for formal legal amendments to a tender, for which the tenderAmendment tag should be used.
This tag is used only in compiled records, which have merged together multiple releases to provide a snapshot view of the contract, and a version history.
